Subject: Erotica in Speculative Fiction
Description: Birds do it, bees do it, and elves and aliens do it. Our panelists talk about erotica in science fiction and fantasy genre fiction.  Speakers include:Ken MacGregor, Jay Maynard, Nicole Castle, Dave Klecha - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Where Did the Heroes Go?
Description: Science fiction and fantasy were once known for stories with strong, capable heroes and heroines. We take a look at heroes and what's happened to them lately.  Speakers include:Jay Maynard, Eric S. Raymond, Jon Davis, Stewart Sternberg, Christine Daigle - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
